Metrics.groundtruth module#

class Metrics.groundtruth.GroundTruth(filePath=None, pixelSize=None)[source]#

Bases: object

This class is used to read the listmode data from the simulation and generate the ground truth image. The grouth truth image is generated The data is filtered in energy and for different CTRs
